document.full_text: a former belgian bishop at the center of one of the catholic church's biggest pedophile scandals said thursday that he had abused two nephews and insisted he had no plans to abandon the priesthood.
document.title: belgian bishop admits abusing second nephew
lines_and_colors: a former belgian bishop at the center of one of the catholic church's biggest pedophile scandals said thursday that he had abused two nephews and insisted he had no plans to abandon the priesthood.
